name: who-targets-me
description: Track the extent of digital political advertising, discover which parties are targeting you

scripts.dev: OFFLINE=true BROWSER=chrome webpack --config src/chrome/webpack.daemon.config.js --watch & OFFLINE=true BROWSER=chrome webpack --config src/chrome/webpack.frontend.config.js --watch
scripts.build-chrome: BROWSER=chrome webpack --config src/build/webpack.daemon.config.js & BROWSER=chrome webpack --config src/build/webpack.frontend.config.js
scripts.build-firefox: BROWSER=firefox webpack --config src/build/webpack.daemon.config.js & BROWSER=firefox webpack --config src/build/webpack.frontend.config.js
